languages.text: "Ишь, какие разодетые! Важные господа, поди. Да только в этом Троном прокл... кхм, благословенном месте все равны".
"Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."
languages.original_text: "Ишь, какие разодетые! Важные господа, поди. Да только в этом Троном прокл... кхм, благословенном месте все равны".

traits.locale_text: "Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."
"Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."
"Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."
"Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."

languages.text: "Seht sie an, allesamt gehüllt in feinstes Tuch! Wichtige Leute vermutlich. Aber an diesem Thron-verlass... äh, gesegneten Ort sind alle gleich."
languages.original_text: "Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."

traits.locale_text: "Seht sie an, allesamt gehüllt in feinstes Tuch! Wichtige Leute vermutlich. Aber an diesem Thron-verlass... äh, gesegneten Ort sind alle gleich."

languages.text: “看看那些人吧，所有人都穿得那么漂亮！我猜应该都是些大人物吧。不过，在这个被黄金王座遗——咳咳，祝福的地方，所有人都是平等的。”
languages.original_text: "Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."

traits.locale_text: “看看那些人吧，所有人都穿得那么漂亮！我猜应该都是些大人物吧。不过，在这个被黄金王座遗——咳咳，祝福的地方，所有人都是平等的。”

languages.text: « Regardez-les, à faire les paons dans leurs beaux habits ! J'imagine que ce sont des gens importants... Mais dans ce fout... hum, ce lieu béni, nous sommes tous égaux. »
languages.original_text: "Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."

traits.locale_text: « Regardez-les, à faire les paons dans leurs beaux habits ! J'imagine que ce sont des gens importants... Mais dans ce fout... hum, ce lieu béni, nous sommes tous égaux. »

languages.text: «¡Míralos, todos de gala! Supongo que serán gente importante. Pero en este lugar maldi... bendito por el Trono, somos todos iguales».
languages.original_text: "Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."

traits.locale_text: «¡Míralos, todos de gala! Supongo que serán gente importante. Pero en este lugar maldi... bendito por el Trono, somos todos iguales».

languages.text: 「彼らを見ろ、皆立派に着飾っている！重要な人物なのだろう。だが、この王座に見捨て…ごほん、祝福されし場所では、皆が平等だ」
languages.original_text: "Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らを見ろ、皆立派に着飾っている！重要な人物なのだろう。だが、この王座に見捨て…ごほん、祝福されし場所では、皆が平等だ」

languages.text: "Bak bak, nasıl da süslenilmiş öyle! Önemli şahsiyetler herhâlde. Tabii Taht'ın unuttuğu... Şey, yani Taht'ın kutsadığı bu yerde herkes eşittir."
languages.original_text: "Look at them, all dressed up in their finery! Important folk, I suppose. But in this Throne-forsak— ahem, blessed place, all are equal."

traits.locale_text: "Bak bak, nasıl da süslenilmiş öyle! Önemli şahsiyetler herhâlde. Tabii Taht'ın unuttuğu... Öhöm, yani Taht'ın kutsadığı bu yerde herkes eşittir."
